import React from 'react' import {connect} from 'react-redux' import {createStructuredSelector} from 'reselect' import {selectCollectionTags, selectFilterMenu} from '../../redux/shop/shop.selectors' import {FilterMenuContainer, TagsListContainer, TagItem} from './filter-menu.styles' const FilterMenu = ({tags, hidden, handleClick}) => { const tagsFlatMap = [...new Set(tags[0])] return ( { tagsFlatMap.map(item => ( {item} )) }

) } const mapStateToProps = createStructuredSelector({ tags: selectCollectionTags, hidden: selectFilterMenu }) export default connect(mapStateToProps)(FilterMenu)
